title: Major service disruption on East West Line due to track fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 东西线因轨道故障导致主要服务中断
title_translations.ms: Gangguan perkhidmatan utama di Laluan Timur Barat kerana kerosakan trek
title_translations.ta: தடக் கோளாறு காரணமாக கிழக்கு மேற்கு பாதையில் பெரிய சேவை இடையூறு

updates.text: [EWL] CLEARED: Normal train service has resumed from #TanahMerah to #Bugis.
[EWL]UPDATE:Additional travel time has been reduced to 5mins from #TanahMerah to #Bugis. Train svc is still available.
[EWL]UPDATE:Additional travel time remained at 10mins from #TanahMerah to #Bugis. Train svc is still available.
[EWL]UPDATE:Additional travel time has been reduced to 10mins from #TanahMerah to #Bugis. Train svc is still available.
[EWL]Update:Due to track fault, pls add 20 mins travel time from #TanahMerah to #Bugis towards #JooKoon. Train service is still available.
[EWL]: Due to a track fault, pls add 10 mins travel time from #TanahMerah to #Bugis towards #JooKoon. Train service is still available.
